website_summaries.verdict: A very heavy-duty tool designed to give you precision in your caulk jobs.
pros: Tool holds the caulk tubes in place without a jiggle
Includes a screw adjustment to the squeeze mechanism to allow you to dial in the right amount of flow for your caulk job
Rubber cover on the handle is easy on the hands

customer_reviews.title: Nice caulk gun, but test it out first before using.
customer_reviews.text: Nice smooth action. Tube barrel rotates independently from handle. I was looking for a drip less caulking gun but this unit doesn’t stop dripping. The good thing is how easy the release functions. The seal breaker is too thick requiring the caulk tube top to be opened more largely than necessary. Couple that with the high ration trigger and you have a recipe for a mess. Don’t use the breaker on the handle and cut the tube to your preference unless you need to caulk a large gap. The gun takes some time to get used to but it does work well.
customer_reviews.author: Jason D.

customer_reviews.title: It feels like I am using a Ferrari to lay caulking...
customer_reviews.text: It feels like I am using a Ferrari to lay caulking. For years I used the cheapest big box guns I could find, but this one makes me regret not switching to quality sooner. It is very smooth loading, so each bead is controlled and I don't ever worry about jumps or slop in the mechanism that would make me blob during use. Overall, this or any quality gun is worth the money over cheapos.
customer_reviews.author: GodkastTop Contributor: Firefly (TV Show)

customer_reviews.title: The factory loves them
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my Aunt and I got to see the factory guys using it for the first time today. Heavy Duty and perfect for what they need. Very durable I heard and I was please to take the chance based on other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki BL

customer_reviews.title: Solid build(feel)
customer_reviews.text: Solid build the metal poker on the handle is ok (needs be alil longer) but does punch the membrane caulking tube, the dripless adjustment screw🤦‍♂️smh. I just continue using the release lever I've always been using it's just easier & muscle memory...
customer_reviews.author: Christmas

customer_reviews.title: Among the top contenders!
customer_reviews.text: Super smooth control and flow, solid and durable build, definitely among the top contenders for best caulk gun available!
customer_reviews.author: V-Card

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: As soon as you let go of the trigger all of the caulk FLOWS out at a high rate. Wastes a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Wingard

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and still good value
customer_reviews.text: This is the caulking gun to caulk away all caulking guns. The 360° rotation of the tube compartment is the best thing since dank memes. Love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Charbonneau

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic caulking gun, has a good weight, smooth action, and very easy to use. Would recommend it to others and already have
customer_reviews.author: Adam Sager

customer_reviews.title: It is heavy you better go to the gym before holder
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy but Not drip less. Wrong especification Not happy at all .:(
customer_reviews.author: marilyn serrano

customer_reviews.title: Class Act
customer_reviews.text: As a former contractor appreciate the quality and durability of this tool, It is top drawer,Kudos
customer_reviews.author: James C. Casper

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! I was so impressed I ordered a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Houle

customer_reviews.title: Best yet
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Best gun I've used. Keep it clean and it will last a LONG time
customer_reviews.author: Chad Tobin

customer_reviews.title: Good heavy duty caulk gun
customer_reviews.text: Good heavy duty caulk gun. Not dripless. Drips less than my current one but will continue my hunt for a true dripless gun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: have de job done
customer_reviews.text: really good have the job done i buy used from amazon warehouse not even notice the diference a little scratch for almost half of the price
customer_reviews.author: antonio a.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great but doesn’t have cutter for cutting tip on new tube
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: if u have read reviews then I'm telling you this is a bad ass chaulk gun
customer_reviews.text: Buy this gun, if u have read reviews then I'm telling you this is a bad ass chaulk gun!
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: VERY Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: No more big box store junk guns for me. This gun is well worth the extra money. Runs a bead of cold GeoCel one handed.
customer_reviews.author: Electrical Contractor Bob

customer_reviews.title: I didn't like it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this heavy duty gun to do a lot of polyurethane caulk that tends to be thicker and harder to pump from the tube. This caulking gun actually will tire out your hand. THe grip is too far out requiring straining to get it started then the squeeze takes way too much effort and the caulk oozes out when the trigger is released. I bought the yellow plastic gun at the same time for $12.00 and it works way better, no drip and easy trigger squeeze and 1/5 the weight = more enjoyable experience. I have used the yellow plastic in the past but they are hard to find. Sherwin Williams carries them.
customer_reviews.author: Mark M.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Tough as nails.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. High quality. Feels as tough as nails.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Here's how to handle caulk!
customer_reviews.text: Whether you are a pro handling a variety of caulk, or just have occasional need for some caulk at home, this gun can help you keep things well in hand. It's heavy duty, so even those whose jobs involve a lot of caulk will be able to keep going. This thing can stand up to a lot of punishment. Its versatility means that you'll be able to use caulk in various sizes and varieties. I appreciate the rubberized handle, making a full day of filling crevices with caulk much more comfortable. No more sore hands for me.
customer_reviews.author: J. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Excellent high quality Caulk Gun that works perfect every time.
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST Caulk Gun I've ever used, the frame is solid with wide closed ends that support the Caulk tubes holding them in place. The handles are cast rather than pressed sheet metal, they are also plastic dipped for comfort and grip. The drive clips are doubled to insure smooth solid operation. The release tab that removes pressure on the Caulk tube works easy without fighting free. If you want the best hand operated caulk gun it doesn't get much better than this.
customer_reviews.author: jj

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and easy to use, nice grip
customer_reviews.text: This caulking gun works very well. It has a smooth action and dispenses caulk evenly and easily. It is far above the cheap ones you get at the hardware store. With that said, it won't make much of a difference for a little thing, but for a bigger project, it will make a difference. You will get done faster, but more importantly, you will feel less fatigued. It is very comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: Morley Dotes

customer_reviews.title: Great for large projects
customer_reviews.text: We recently tackled a large renovation which included lots of moulding. I can't emphasize enough how much buying a good quality caulking gun made the project so much easier. I used this new gun while my husband used our old gun. There was no comparison. I flew through feet of moulding without any drips, or skips. No such luck with the old gun. Good product
customer_reviews.author: Misuzmama

customer_reviews.title: Excellent construction, only one complaint
customer_reviews.text: This caulking gun is very heavy, and very heavy duty, it's built like a tank. The handles are rubber coated and very comfortable to use. I've used it a couple of times now to caulk around sinks and bathtubs, and it works much better than the cheap ones I normally get at the box stores. My only complaint is the lack of a tip cutter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The king of caulk guns
customer_reviews.text: There is no looking back after you've tried this caulk gun. I'm as cheap as they come. I'll take generic and off brand every time to save a few bucks. But this caulk gun is worth every penny. Do not bother comparing on price, you are not comparing the same thing. This is a well tuned caulking machine. All the parts are top quality. Construction is top quality. It will last a long time. One squeeze and you will be sold.
customer_reviews.author: Bookenator

customer_reviews.title: Not dripless! A mess!
customer_reviews.text: Sorry to report the fact that this gun is not dripless! There are no instructions on how to make it so either! It is a beautiful thing though! Well built but not at all dripless so I'm going to return it.I'm buying a Tajima dripless and I hope it's as good as the rest of their products!
customer_reviews.author: Frankie Parm

product_meta.title: OX Tools Pro 10 oz Caulk Gun 12:1 Thrust Ratio, Release Mechanism to Reduce Flow, Built in Poker, Rubber Handle (OX-P044410)
product_meta.description: A professional heavy-duty 10 oz. caulk gun with a 12 to 1 thrust ratio. Made with a rotating body to make sure you can have a consistent bead every time. The amount of material pumped out every time can be adjusted so that the right amount is used every time.
feature_bullets: mechanism pulls back the push rod ensuring caulk does not continue to flow
Rubber over molded ergonomic grip designed for all day use
Built-in poker to easily start the caulking
Ergonomically designed handles coated in rubber keeps wrist in a natural comfortable and balance position, providing years of service
Silent squeeze mechanism prevents squeaking when trigger is activated - dual plates thrust mechanism ensures sufficient pressure
